item.title: Why no mopar weekly?
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

[quote=“x Albi x, post:12, topic:552469”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=671386.msg4489916#msg4489916 date=1436989139]

lol cant keep up with one post every 7 days who gave this guy permission to post announcements

lol posts on threads being a dick and trolling every day who gave this guy permissions to moderate the forums.

you should have seen how he used to be

if i can give you an example, he was hitler and mopar was nazi germany.

i’d say hes improved

Albi’s been here for a while. He knows of davids ways

ahh i hadn’t seen his join date until now
[/quote]
David is the best moparscape moderator ever, he is a good friendly man with respectable skills in life and banana milkshakes. I love David, best mod EUW… He carries fiddlesticks mid lane most days.[/quote]

Read full topic
